headline: Charlene MacDonald Named President & Chief Executive Officer of Federation of American Hospitals
summary: The Federation of American Hospitals (FAH) Board of Directors today announced Charlene MacDonald as its next President and CEO, effective January 1, 2026. MacDonald succeeds Charles (Chip) N. Kahn III who announced his retirement earlier this year.
